verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Shushan Eduth. Michtam of David, to teach; when he strove with Aram-naharaim and with Aram-zobah, and Joab returned, and smote of Edom in the Valley of Salt twelve thousand. O God <S%H430><s%> thou hast cast us off <S%H2186><s%>, thou hast broken <S%H6555><s%> us down <S%H599><s%>; Thou hast been angry; oh restore us again <S%H7725><s%>.
Thou hast made the land <S%H776><s%> to tremble <S%H7493><s%>; thou hast rent <S%H6480><s%> it <S%H7495><s%>: Heal the breaches <S%H7667><s%> thereof <S%H4131><s%>; for it shaketh.
Thou hast showed <S%H7200><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> hard things <S%H7186><s%>: Thou hast made us to drink <S%H8248><s%> the wine <S%H3196><s%> of staggering <S%H8653><s%>.

Thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> a banner <S%H5251><s%> to them that fear <S%H3373><s%> thee <S%H5127><s%>, That it may be displayed because <S%H6440><s%> of the truth <S%H7189><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
That thy beloved <S%H3039><s%> may be delivered <S%H2502><s%>, Save <S%H3467><s%> with thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>, and answer us <S%H6030><s%>.

God <S%H430><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> in his holiness <S%H6944><s%>: I will exult <S%H5937><s%>; I will divide <S%H2505><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%>, and mete out <S%H4058><s%> the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Succoth <S%H5523><s%>.
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is mine <S%H4519><s%>, and Manasseh is mine <S%H669><s%>; Ephraim also is the defence <S%H4581><s%> of my head <S%H7218><s%>; Judah <S%H3063><s%> is my sceptre <S%H2710><s%>.
Moab <S%H4124><s%> is my washpot <S%H5518><s%>; Upon Edom <S%H123><s%> will I cast <S%H7993><s%> my shoe <S%H5275><s%>: Philistia <S%H6429><s%>, shout thou because of me <S%H7321><s%>.
Who will bring <S%H2986><s%> me into the strong <S%H4692><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>? Who hath led <S%H5148><s%> me unto Edom <S%H123><s%>?
Hast not thou <S%H430><s%>, O God, cast us off <S%H2186><s%>? And thou goest not forth <S%H3318><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, with our hosts <S%H6635><s%>.
Give <S%H3051><s%> us help <S%H5833><s%> against the adversary <S%H6862><s%>; For vain <S%H7723><s%> is the help <S%H8668><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>.
Through God <S%H430><s%> we shall do <S%H6213><s%> valiantly <S%H2428><s%>; For he it is that will tread down <S%H947><s%> our adversaries <S%H6862><s%>.
